thread.title: Charles Oakley named player/coach in Ice Cube’s new 3-on-3 hoops league
thread.title_full: Charles Oakley named player/coach in Ice Cube’s new 3-on-3 hoops league

author: Marcus DiNitto (mdinitto@sportingnews.com)
title: Charles Oakley named player/coach in Ice Cube’s new 3-on-3 hoops league
text:
MORE: Prop bets for the 2017 NBA All-Star Game 
In addition to Billups and Jackson, Allen Iverson, Jermaine O'Neal, Kenyon Martin, Mike Bibby, Rashard Lewis, Jason Williams, Bonzi Wells, Corey Maggette, Al Harrington and Ricky Davis are listed on the BIG 3’s website as team captains. Clyde Drexler, Gary Payton, George Gervin, Rick Barry and Rick Mahorn are listed under the players/coaches tab. 
Former Knick Latrell Sprewell is also slated to play in the 3-on-3 league, setting up an intriguing matchup when his team plays the Killer 3s. 
Sprewell was a guest of Dolan’s at a recent Knicks game , which isn't sitting well with Oakley, who was forcibly removed from the Knicks-Clippers game at Madison Square Garden last week for alleging acting belligerently and directing disparaging comments at Dolan. 
"I'm really pissed about how they brought those guys back to sit with him," Oakley said, per ESPN . "Bernard King is a legend and everything, but he went through an incident where he was wronged in college by the police. And I can't respect Sprewell. These guys were flown in town to make him look good. I can't respect those guys no more." 
Said Ice Cube, whose league is scheduled to tip this summer, "The players and coaches are our central focus at the BIG3. Charles Oakley is an NBA legend, who deserves and has earned respect, and will get just that in our league." Watch This
